org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: In the Superior Court of the State of Washington, for the County of Pierce, formerly in the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding terms at Tacoma for Pierce County.

---------------------------- : The Territory of Washington on: the relation of George Hazzard: Plaintiff, : vs. : ASSIGNMENT OF ERRORS. James H. Price and M.J.Aguirre: Defendants. : : -------------------------------

Now on this 13th day of December 1889 comes the above named plaintiff, by his attorneys, and filed the following assignment of errors upon which he will atty for a reversal of the said cause in the Supreme Court of the State of Washington.
Error of the Court in admitting in evidence on behalf of the defendants the affidavit marked Exhibit "A" and also error in admitting the warrant marked Exhibit "B".
Error of the Court in permitting the witness Brady,on behalf of defendants to answer the following question,propounded to him by defendants' attorney.-
"Do you know that this George Hazzard, who is now under arrest is the same George Hazzard who is wanted under that indictment."
